price: Pero él [el demonio] desvió a muchos de ustedes. ¿Por qué no reflexionan?
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ أَضَلَّ مِنكُمۡ جِبِلّٗا كَثِيرًاۖ أَفَلَمۡ تَكُونُواْ تَعۡقِلُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad aḍalla minkum jibillan kathīran afalam takūnū taʿqilūna
